content.en: Composite structure optimization: Researchers have used algorithms to address various questions related to optimizing the design of laminated composite structures. For example, they have used genetic algorithms to determine the dimensions and stacking sequence of composite plates, as well as to optimize the ply angles for damage-tolerant designs. Other algorithms, such as the harmony search algorithm and particle swarm optimization algorithm, have been employed to optimize the stacking sequence and material distribution for different types of composite structures. These algorithms help researchers find the most efficient and effective designs for laminated composites.
content.da: Sammensat struktur optimering: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at besvare forskellige spørgsmål relateret til optimering af designet af laminerede kompositstrukturer. For eksempel har de brugt genetiske algoritmer til at bestemme dimensionerne og stablingssekvensen af kompositplader samt til at optimere lagvinklerne for skadetolerante designs. Andre algoritmer, såsom harmony search-algoritmen og particle swarm-optimeringsalgoritmen, er blevet anvendt til at optimere stablingssekvensen og materialefordelingen for forskellige typer af kompositstrukturer. Disse algoritmer hjælper forskere med at finde de mest effektive og effektfulde designs for laminerede kompositter.
